data.name: Save The Astronaut Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The Save The Astronaut soundtrack includes the complete game soundtrack along with unused and prototype tracks not featured in the release game.
data.about_the_game: The Save The Astronaut soundtrack includes the complete game soundtrack along with unused and prototype tracks not featured in the release game.
data.short_description: The Save The Astronaut soundtrack with additional bonus content.
